00030 #define DEFAULT_LINKEA_SIZE     4096
00031 
00032 struct linkea_data {
00036         struct lu_buf           *ld_buf;
00040         struct link_ea_header   *ld_leh;
00041         struct link_ea_entry    *ld_lee;
00042         int                     ld_reclen;
00043 };
00044 
00045 int linkea_data_new(struct linkea_data *ldata, struct lu_buf *buf);
00046 int linkea_init(struct linkea_data *ldata);
00047 void linkea_entry_unpack(const struct link_ea_entry *lee, int *reclen,
00048                          struct lu_name *lname, struct lu_fid *pfid);
00049 int linkea_entry_pack(struct link_ea_entry *lee, const struct lu_name *lname,
00050                       const struct lu_fid *pfid);
00051 int linkea_add_buf(struct linkea_data *ldata, const struct lu_name *lname,
00052                    const struct lu_fid *pfid);
00053 void linkea_del_buf(struct linkea_data *ldata, const struct lu_name *lname);
00054 int linkea_links_find(struct linkea_data *ldata, const struct lu_name *lname,
00055                       const struct lu_fid  *pfid);
00056 
00057 static inline void linkea_first_entry(struct linkea_data *ldata)
00058 {
00059         LASSERT(ldata != NULL);
00060         LASSERT(ldata->ld_leh != NULL);
00061 
00062         if (ldata->ld_leh->leh_reccount == 0)
00063                 ldata->ld_lee = NULL;
00064         else
00065                 ldata->ld_lee = (struct link_ea_entry *)(ldata->ld_leh + 1);
00066 }
00067 
00068 static inline void linkea_next_entry(struct linkea_data *ldata)
00069 {
00070         LASSERT(ldata != NULL);
00071         LASSERT(ldata->ld_leh != NULL);
00072 
00073         if (ldata->ld_lee != NULL) {
00074                 ldata->ld_lee = (struct link_ea_entry *)((char *)ldata->ld_lee +
00075                                                          ldata->ld_reclen);
00076                 if ((char *)ldata->ld_lee >= ((char *)ldata->ld_leh +
00077                                               ldata->ld_leh->leh_len))
00078                         ldata->ld_lee = NULL;
00079         }
00080 }
